game.title: The Lost Artifact
game.objective: Find and retrieve the sacred artifact
game.description: The sacred artifact of Valoria kingdom has been lost. Your task is to retrieve it from the Mysterious Woods.

tasks.objective: Search for clues about the artifact's location in the Library of Valoria
tasks.description: Gather information about the possible location of the artifact. It is believed that the Library of Valoria might have some clues.
Once you have gathered enough information, prepare to journey to the Mysterious Woods where the artifact is believed to be.
Find the sacred artifact and retrieve it. Be careful of the dangers that lurk in the woods.
